Class Event

java.lang.Object
Event
Direct Known Subclasses:
Social, Talk
public class Event extends Object
The Event class where Talk and Social inherit from. Contains variables and methods that all events will use.
Version:
2.1 31/03/2022
Author:
George Deering

    • setVenue

      public void setVenue(Venue venue)
      Sets the venue. This will only be allowed if the meets the data projector requirement. Otherwise displays an error message. This should really throw an exception
      Parameters:
      venue - The venue for the event

    • getVenue

      Returns:
      boolean dataProjectorRequired

    • setDataProjectorRequired

      public void setDataProjectorRequired(boolean dataProjectorRequired)
      Sets the data projector requirement. This will only be allowed if there is an associated venue that meets the requirement. Otherwise displays an error message. This should really throw an exception
      Parameters:
      dataProjectorRequired - Whether required or not
